title: MSCS in Fall '24?
content:
Hey folks, 

I'm planning to apply for Masters in Computer Science in US Colleges for Fall '24.
Wanted to connect with people planning the same, and maybe create a study group if possible (I understand GRE is not compulsory now, but still ðŸ˜¬) 

Btw, I've graduated and am currently working.

comments.body:
I asked quite a few people who are in 6th sem CSE, most of them arenâ€™t still quite sure to go for MS in CS or one year experience and then go. 
Just my PoV
Yeah that sounds fair for 6th sem CSE students
Can any of the seniors tell.. when is the best time to apply for masters fall'24. Would it be better if we wait till December or jan of 24' or would it be too late by then.
Most uni's keep their admissions open from Sep - Dec, so you'll have to apply by then. Jan onwards it when they start responding with their decisions
Hi OP, I'm applying for Fall'24 as well. Lets connect.
